Text.Page:
I have a favor to ask. We're supposed to be observing the Black Claw orcans, but we're overrun with {@LinkCreature:41#1003#sable sabertooths} and {@LinkCreature:41#1002#noralk kamaras}.

Keeping their numbers down doesn't leave us much time, not to mention the problem of injuries. Will you join the hunt while you're here? {@LinkCreature:241#1003$$Jaebel} will pay you.
You've helped us a great deal. I'd like you to have this token of our gratitude.
